com.crudetech.graphics2d.xwt

Interface CoordinateSystemStack

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<Matrix2d>

    public interface CoordinateSystemStack
extends Iterable<Matrix2d>
    When implemented, it represents a transformation stack. Its main difference to a normal stack like LightweightStack is, that pushing a new transformation on top results the pushed matrix being multiplied with the peek matrix. Therefore a call to peek() will give you the overall transform of all former transformations.

    Every pushed transformation is applied to the top most coordinate system by post multiplying the pushed transformation. Therefore the stack represents a series of coordinate system transforms, where the top most is the basis for the next step. This behaviour is the same as in object coordinate system using frameworks such as OpenGL.
